exceptions.exn: In environment x, p : nat Unable to unify "?M1541 * (?M1542 + ?M1543) = ?M1541 * ?M1542 + ?M1541 * ?M1543" with "2 * (x * (x + p)) <= x * x + (x + p) * (x + p)".

original: apply Nat.mul_add_distr_l. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_r. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_r. rewrite Nat.mul_shuffle3. rewrite Nat.mul_shuffle3. rewrite Nat.mul_shuffle3. rewrite Nat.mul_assoc. assert (x * p + x * x = x * (x + p)) as H by omega. rewrite H. apply Nat.add_square_le; auto with arith.
